<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<mx:Module xmlns:mx="http://www.adobe.com/2006/mxml"
    layout="vertical" creationComplete="init()" width="100%" height="100%" horizontalAlign="center"
    paddingLeft="5" paddingRight="5" paddingTop="10" paddingBottom="10" xmlns:local="*">
    
    <mx:Style source="../assets/styles/styles.css" />

    <mx:Script>
        <![CDATA[
            import mx.managers.DragManager;
            import mx.events.ListEvent;
            import mx.events.DataGridEvent;
            import mx.collections.ArrayCollection;
            import flash.filesystem.File;
            import flash.desktop.ClipboardFormats;
            import com.adobe.share.api.ShareAPI;
            import com.adobe.share.api.ShareAPIEvent;
            import com.adobe.share.api.ShareAPIUser;
            import com.adobe.share.api.ShareAPIToken;
            import com.adobe.crypto.MD5;
            
            private var api : ShareAPI = null;
            private var user : ShareAPIUser = null;
            
            [Bindable]
            private var dgData : ArrayCollection = null;
            
            [Bindable]
            private var transfers : ArrayCollection = null;
            private var transferTable : Object = null;

            private var thumbnails : Object = null;
            
            private var thumbnailTimer : Timer = new Timer(500);
            private var thumbnailStack : Array = null;
            
            public function init() : void {
                api = new ShareAPI("1b171e52152ffa092a9c40ed16e04f9c", "7e82b65a104ed5b434688ba018e9c9b9");            

                addEventListener(NativeDragEvent.NATIVE_DRAG_ENTER, onDragEnter);
                addEventListener(NativeDragEvent.NATIVE_DRAG_DROP, onDragDrop);    
                thumbnailTimer.addEventListener(TimerEvent.TIMER, requestThumbnail);
                imgThumb.height = loginBox.height;
                imgThumb.scaleContent = true;
            }    
            
            public function login() : void {
                user = new ShareAPIUser(txtId.text, txtPassword.text);        
                var token : ShareAPIToken = api.login(user);
                token.addEventListener(ShareAPIEvent.API_AUTHENTICATED, 
                    function(event : ShareAPIEvent) : void {
                        btnLogout.enabled = true;
                        btnLogin.enabled = false;
                        txtId.text = "";
                        txtPassword.text = "";
                        trace(event);
                        getDocumentList();
                    });
                token.addEventListener(ShareAPIEvent.API_FAILURE, onFault);
                
                thumbnails = new Object();
                transfers = new ArrayCollection();
                thumbnailStack = new Array();
                transferTable = new Object();
                dgData = new ArrayCollection();
            }
            
            public function logout() : void {
                api.logout(user);
                btnLogout.enabled = false;
                btnLogin.enabled = true;
                dgData = null;
            }
            
            public function downloadFile() : void {
                
                trace(dgFiles.selectedItem);
                
                var f : Object = dgFiles.selectedItem;
                transferTable[f.@nodeid] = new Object();
                transferTable[f.@nodeid]["name"] = dgFiles.selectedItem.@name.toString();
                transferTable[f.@nodeid]["progress"] = new ProgressEvent("DOWNLOADED");
                transfers.addItem(transferTable[f.@nodeid]);
                       
                var token : ShareAPIToken = api.downloadFile(user, f.@nodeid.toString());
                
                token.addEventListener(ProgressEvent.PROGRESS,
                       function(event : ProgressEvent) : void {
                           trace('progress');
                           trace(event.bytesLoaded);
                           trace(event.target.nodeId);
                           trace("..." + transferTable[event.target.nodeId]["name"]);
                        transferTable[event.target.nodeId]["progress"] = event;
                        transfers.itemUpdated(transferTable[event.target.nodeId]);
                       });
                       
                   token.addEventListener(ShareAPIEvent.API_RESULT,
                       function(event : ShareAPIEvent) : void {
                           
                           var file : File = File.createTempFile();
                           var fileStream : FileStream = new FileStream();
                           fileStream.open(file, FileMode.WRITE);
                           fileStream.writeBytes(event.bytes);  
                           fileStream.close();              

                        var file2 : File = new File();
                        file2.addEventListener(Event.SELECT,
                            function(event : Event) : void {
                                file.moveTo(file2);
                            });
                           file2.browseForSave("Save document");
                        
                       });
            }
            
            private function getDocumentList() : void {
                api.getNodes(user, null).addEventListener(
                    ShareAPIEvent.API_RESULT,
                    function(event : ShareAPIEvent) : void {
                        trace(event.payload);
                        var xl : XMLList = event.payload.children.node.(@directory=="false");
                        for each(var node : XML in xl) {
                            dgData.addItem(node);

                            var nodeid : String = node.@nodeid.toString();
                            if(node.@thumbnailstate == 1) {
                                thumbnailStack.push(nodeid);
                            }
                        }
                        
                        thumbnailTimer.start();
                    });
            }
            
            private function requestThumbnail(event : TimerEvent) : void {
                var nodeid : String = thumbnailStack.pop();
                if (nodeid != null) {
                    trace('getting thumbnail for ' + nodeid);
                    api.getThumbnail(user, nodeid).addEventListener(ShareAPIEvent.API_RESULT,
                        function(event2 : ShareAPIEvent) : void {
                            trace(event2.target.nodeId);
                            thumbnails[event2.target.nodeId] = event2.bytes;
                        });
                }
            }
            
            public function onDragEnter(event : NativeDragEvent) : void {
                DragManager.acceptDragDrop(this);
            }
            
            public function onDragDrop(event : NativeDragEvent) : void {
                var files:Array = event.clipboard.getData(ClipboardFormats.FILE_LIST_FORMAT) as Array;
                for each (var f:File in files)
                {
                   api.uploadFile(user, f, null, f.name, "uploaded from AIR", true);

                   trace('adding ' + f.name + ' to uploads');
                   transferTable[f.name] = new Object();
                   transferTable[f.name]["name"] = f.name;
                   transferTable[f.name]["progress"] = new ProgressEvent("UPLOADED");
                   transfers.addItem(transferTable[f.name]);
                   f.addEventListener(ProgressEvent.PROGRESS,
                           function(event : ProgressEvent) : void {
                               trace('progress');
                               trace(event.bytesLoaded);
                               trace(event.target.name);
                               trace("..." + transferTable[event.target.name]["name"]);
                            transferTable[event.target.name]["progress"] = event;
                            transfers.itemUpdated(transferTable[event.target.name]);
                           });
                   f.addEventListener(ShareAPIEvent.API_RESULT,
                           function(event : ShareAPIEvent) : void{
                               var node : XML = event.payload.node[0];
                               dgData.addItem(node);                
                           });
                }
            }
                
            private function onDgChange(event : ListEvent) : void {
                btnDownload.enabled = true;
                var nodeId : String = event.currentTarget.selectedItem.@nodeid.toString();
                trace(nodeId);
                if(thumbnails[nodeId] != null) {
                    var loader : Loader = new Loader();
                    loader.loadBytes(thumbnails[nodeId]);
                    trace(loader.contentLoaderInfo.bytesLoaded + " / " + loader.contentLoaderInfo.bytesTotal);
                    loader.contentLoaderInfo.addEventListener(Event.COMPLETE,
                        function(event : Event) : void {
                            imgThumb.visible = true;
                            imgThumb.source = loader;
                        });
                } else {
                    imgThumb.visible = false;
                } 
                    
            }
            
            private function onFault(event : ShareAPIEvent) : void {
                trace(event.error);
            }

            private function tsToDate(item : XML, column : DataGridColumn) : String {
                trace(item.@createddate.toString());
                
                var d : Date = new Date(parseInt(item.@createddate));
                trace(d);
                return d.toDateString();
            }
            
        ]]>
    </mx:Script>

    <mx:HBox horizontalGap="4">
        <mx:Label text="SHARE" styleName="productNameLabel"/>
        <mx:Label text="beta" styleName="betaNameLabel"/>
    </mx:HBox>
    <mx:HBox width="9%" id="loginBox">
        <mx:Form>
            <mx:FormItem label="Adobe ID:" color="#FFFFFF">
                <mx:TextInput id="txtId" color="#000000"/>
            </mx:FormItem>
            <mx:FormItem label="Password:" color="#FFFFFF">
                <mx:TextInput id="txtPassword" color="#000000" displayAsPassword="true"/>
                <mx:HBox width="100%">
                    <mx:Button label="Login" id="btnLogin" click="login()"/>
                    <mx:Button label="Logout" id="btnLogout" enabled="false" click="logout()"/>
                </mx:HBox>
            </mx:FormItem>
        </mx:Form>
        <mx:Image height="100%" id="imgThumb" scaleContent="false"/>
    </mx:HBox>
    <mx:HBox horizontalGap="40" width="90%" horizontalAlign="right">
        <mx:Button label="Refresh" id="btnRefresh" click="getDocumentList()"/>
        <mx:Spacer width="100%"/>
        <mx:Button label="Download" id="btnDownload" click="downloadFile()" enabled="false"/>
    </mx:HBox>
    <mx:DataGrid width="90%" id="dgFiles" dataProvider="{dgData}" height="100%" doubleClickEnabled="true" change="onDgChange(event)">
        <mx:columns>
            <mx:DataGridColumn headerText="Name" dataField="@name"/>
            <mx:DataGridColumn headerText="Size" dataField="@filesize"/>
            <mx:DataGridColumn headerText="Date" dataField="@createddate" labelFunction="tsToDate"/>
        </mx:columns>
    </mx:DataGrid>
    <mx:DataGrid width="90%" id="dgTransfers" dataProvider="{transfers}" height="106">
        <mx:columns>
            <mx:DataGridColumn headerText="Name" dataField="name"/>
            <mx:DataGridColumn headerText="Progress" dataField="progress">
                <mx:itemRenderer>
                    <mx:Component>
                        <local:ProgressRenderer />
                    </mx:Component>
                </mx:itemRenderer>
            </mx:DataGridColumn>
        </mx:columns>
    </mx:DataGrid>
    
</mx:Module>
